title: Direct current systems
fullText:
*	All conductors of a d.c. circuit shall be capable of being isolated by a device for isolation.
NOTE: Guidance is provided in Appendix Q on the installation of d.c. systems.
Exceptions:
1	In the case of a d.c. circuit having one conductor connected either to earth or to a protective earthing conductor, that conductor need not be isolated or switched.
2	In accordance with Clause 7.5.8.2(b), switches in an extra-low voltage
d.c. electrical installation may operate in one less conductor than the number of conductors in the circuit.
